name: Cut Paper!
description:
Cut Paper is the new addictive single-tap game! How about some slicing action?

Cut Paper is a simple relaxing game for all ages. Get more precise with practice. If you are accurate enough, you will get multiplier combo rewards. Unlock new colors and scissors of all types. New paper colors will appear and speed up the game to make the experience more challenging.

Play now and cut the biggest cardboard slice. Feel free to reach to us if you have any questions or suggestions.

Enjoy and have fun!
